item.title: R Notebook Example with R, Python, and BibTeX
item.description: The accompanying R Notebook is a simple example that combines R code chunks, Python code chunks, and BibTeX literature citations in one R Markdown document. For additional information please see RStudio as a Research and Writing Platform. Click here to read the notebook.
